overview: Contact page for Digital Experience Healthcare providing contact information, a validated contact form, success/error banners, and accessibility features for user communication.
key_components: Navbar with theme toggle and navigation links
Hero section with title and subtitle
Success and error banners with dismiss buttons
Contact form with validation and submit button
Help section with emergency and support options
Footer with quick links and contact details
interactions: Theme toggle button switches between light and dark modes
Form input validation for required fields (name, email, message)
Submit button enabled only when form is valid
Success banner displayed on successful submission
Error banner displayed on failed submission
Skip link jumps to main content
data_flow: User inputs captured in form fields
Submit triggers async request (implied) to backend endpoint
Response toggles visibility of success or error banners
Form reset or disabled state managed post-submission
accessibility: ARIA roles and live regions on banners and validation messages
aria-required and aria-describedby attributes on form inputs
Semantic headings and landmarks (nav, main, footer)
analytics: Track form submission success and failure events
test_ideas: Verify skip link focuses main content
Validate required field errors appear and clear correctly
Ensure submit button enables only when all required fields valid
Simulate successful submission and confirm success banner visible
Simulate failed submission and confirm error banner visible
Check dismiss buttons hide banners and restore focus
Verify theme toggle persists state across reloads
Confirm ARIA attributes and roles meet accessibility standards
Ensure analytics events fire on key interactions
